description: Admin Panel UI/UX Improvements - Comprehensive overhaul to improve usability, mobile responsiveness, visual hierarchy, and feature completeness for Super Admin and Tenant Admin panels
instructions: IMPORTANT: For ALL user stories that involve UI/frontend work, invoke the frontend-design skill FIRST before writing any code.
The frontend-design skill creates distinctive, production-grade interfaces with high design quality.
To invoke: Use the Skill tool with skill='frontend-design' at the start of each UI story.
UI stories are identified by having 'Verify in browser using dev-browser skill' in acceptance criteria.
After frontend-design generates the code, verify it meets all acceptance criteria.
Existing shadcn/ui components should be used: Button, Card, Table, Badge, Dialog, Select, Input, Checkbox.
Use Lucide React for all icons.
Use Plotly.js for charts and graphs.

userStories.title: Shared Component Library
userStories.description: As a developer, I need reusable components for search/filter/pagination so I don't duplicate code.
acceptanceCriteria: Create components/admin/shared/ directory
Create SearchInput component with TypeScript props interface and JSDoc
Create StatusFilter component with TypeScript props interface and JSDoc
Create Pagination component with TypeScript props interface and JSDoc
Create BulkActionBar component with TypeScript props interface and JSDoc
Create EmptyState component with TypeScript props interface and JSDoc
Components are generic and reusable (not tied to specific domain)
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
userStories.notes: UI STORY: Invoke frontend-design skill first. Use shadcn/ui as base, extend with custom styling.

userStories.title: URL State Management Utility

Hook syncs with URL params using Next.js useSearchParams

Implement setFilter(key, value) function
Implement setPage(n) function
Implement setSort(column) function

Typecheck passes
